name: Hemi Sides
description:
Hemi Sides is a precise puzzler platformer based on reversed physics on two sides of a plane. Traverse your way through the 5 levels, increasing in difficulty and style throughout. The name is a spinoff of hemisphere (two sides different gravity).

  • This game was made for the 3rd Ben Bonk Game Jam in 72 hours.  
  • Enable cursed music in settings for the intended experience.

 If bugs are apparent, it is most likely due to the WEBGL version. The downloadable version is linked below.

CONTROLS: 
Movement: A, D
Jump: Space
Use: E
Reset: R 

MEET THE TEAM:
Jayden - Development 
Evan - Sound & Art

Check the options menu for more information.

This is the 3rd finished game we have made, and the 3rd game jam we have participated in. Any feedback and reviews would be appreciated.
